topic.title: Floating Images in DITA Topics for PDF or XHTML Output

body.p: provides the possibility of floating an image to the left or right of blocks of content in DITA topics for both PDF and XHTML output.

To float an image, you simply need to set the outputclass attribute on the image element. The possible values are:
float-left
float-right
